title: Trades??? Old Judge Cards for sale! More Added Price Drop 7/4
author: Aquarian Sports Cards

posts.post_title: Trades??? Old Judge Cards for sale! More Added Price Drop 7/4
posts.post_content:
Dad Clark (Clarke) Chicago - None of the listed variations match this one so I am assuming it is the one that is merely referred to as Chicago, which matches up with the PSA Pop-Report. This is the only PSA graded example of this variation.


[IMG]http://ebssportscards.com/2018/photos/oldjudge/clarke06.jpg[/IMG] 


[IMG]http://ebssportscards.com/2018/photos/oldjudge/clarke06back.jpg[/IMG]

$200

John Reilly Throwing R/Hand Cap High - Interesting guy and an early power hitter leading the league in HR's Slg and OPS 2x each he quit baseball to continue his already successful commercial art career!
Pink tint with a corner crease in the upper right.

[IMG]http://ebssportscards.com/2018/photos/oldjudge/reilly06.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://ebssportscards.com/2018/photos/oldjudge/reilly06back.jpg[/IMG]

$225

There are more to come. I do have room to negotiate, more on some than others so feel free to shoot me an offer!

Ed Beatin - Rough Shape. Weak image, major back issues, pin hole in the "J" in judge.

[IMG]http://www.ebssportscards.com/2018/oldjudge/beatin06.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.ebssportscards.com/2018/oldjudge/beatin06back.jpg[/IMG]

$120

Bobby Gilks Pitching Hands at Neck weak image on a strong condition card. Clean and sharp with a small crease on the top border.

[IMG]http://www.ebssportscards.com/2018/oldjudge/gilks06.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.ebssportscards.com/2018/oldjudge/gilks06back.jpg[/IMG]

$225

Fred Pfeffer - Catch hands above waist? Not sure if I have the right variation here, but none of the others make sense. Solid 2. Mainly corner wear with a little surface wear and a moderately soiled back.

[IMG]http://www.ebssportscards.com/2018/oldjudge/pfeffer06.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.ebssportscards.com/2018/oldjudge/pfeffer06back.jpg[/IMG]

$200
Also open to trading for Pre-War HOF'ers of almost any condition other than altered.
Seriously interested in T-205, T206, T207 Goudey, Diamond Stars and/or Play Ball in trade!
Prices lowered, still love to make some trades too.
